snippet.title: "She Manipulates People" Celebrities DEFENDING Johnny Depp Against Amber Heard
snippet.description:
These 5 Celebrities Defended Johnny Depp and called out Amber Heard when everybody else stood against Johnny Depp!

In July 2020, during his closing speech at Johnny Depp's libel suit against the British tabloid The Sun, Johnny's lawyer David Sherbourne called Amber Heard a compulsive liar with a propensity to abuse, he said “He has never hit a woman in his entire life period full stop nada” and explained how Amber was the one who physically attacked Johnny on multiple occasions.

✅ Like & Subscribe for more Celebrity Content!

Since then several celebrities have chimed in with their statements supporting Johnny and accusingAmber of being a liar, besides Johnny's former partners, Vanessa Paradis and Winona Ryder various other celebrities have come forward and expressed their concern for Johnny claiming he's the real victim who needs protection from his ex-wife.

#JohnnyDepp #AmberHeard #ElonMusk
